framework.interfaces

Interface Updateable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CanvasObject, Circle, Line, Picture, Rectangle, Square, Text, Triangle, UpdateObject

    public interface Updateable
    The Interface Updateable for handling the update-objects in the application.
    Author:
    Hans Ferchland
    See Also:
    Application

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(Time time)
      The update-method is called by the application for all updateable instances.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(Time time)
        The update-method is called by the application for all updateable instances.

        Implement your code for animation here. If you want to check for mouse, key or window events, use the WindowControl, MouseControl and/or KeyboardControl interfaces.

        Parameters:
        time - the time
        See Also:
        Application, WindowControl, KeyboardControl, MouseControl
